import Modal from '../Modal' import UpdateTransactionModal from '../UpdateTransactionModal' import './index.css' const TransactionItem = props => { const { transactionDetails, onClickDeleteItem, show, showUpdate, showModal, hideUpdateModal, showUpdateModal, hideModal, } = props const {date, type, amount, name, category, id} = transactionDetails // Create a Date object from the timestamp const dateObj = new Date(date) const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'short', hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', hour12: true, } const onClickDelete = () => { onClickDeleteItem(id) } const formattedDate = dateObj.toLocaleString('en-US', options) console.log(formattedDate) const isTrue = type === 'debit' || type === 'dedit' ? 'red-2' : 'green-1' const isDebit = type === 'debit' || type === 'dedit' ? ( ) : ( ) const onChangeUsername = event => { onChangeUsername(event.target.value) } const onChangeType = event => { onChangeType(event.target.value) } const onChangeCategory = event => { onChangeCategory(event.target.value) } const onChangeAmount = event => { onChangeAmount(event.target.value) } const onChangeDate = event => { onChangeDate(event.target.value) } const onClickAddTransaction = () => { onClickAddTransaction(id) } return (
  • {isDebit}

    {name}

    {category}

    {formattedDate}

    {isTrue === 'red-2' ? (

    -${amount}

    ) : (

    +${amount}

    )}
